text: Tommy Joe Coffey (November 18, 1936 â€“ August 25, 2020) was an American-born Canadian Football League (CFL) player. He was a wide receiver and place kicker for the Edmonton Eskimos, Hamilton Tiger-Cats and Toronto Argonauts. He was born in Texas. His career lasted from 1959 to 1973. Coffey died on August 25, 2020 at the age of 83.CFL legend Tommy Joe Coffey passes away ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American football wide receivers Category:American football placekickers Category:Edmonton Elks players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:Toronto Argonauts players
